alert.note: Alert for Berkeley; Jefferson; Morgan (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued May 20 at 1:02PM EDT until May 20 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 251 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN MARYLAND THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MARYLAND HOWARD IN NORTH CENTRAL MARYLAND CARROLL FREDERICK WASHINGTON IN NORTHEAST MARYLAND CECIL IN NORTHERN MARYLAND BALTIMORE BALTIMORE CITY HARFORD IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST VIRGINIA CITY OF WINCHESTER FREDERICK IN WEST VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN PANHANDLE WEST VIRGINIA BERKELEY JEFFERSON MORGAN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABERDEEN, BALLENGER CREEK, BALTIMORE, BEL AIR, CATONSVILLE, CHARLES TOWN, COLUMBIA, DUNDALK, EDGEWOOD, ELDERSBURG, ELKTON, ELLICOTT CITY, ESSEX, FALLSTON, FREDERICK, HAGERSTOWN, HAVRE DE GRACE, JOPPATOWNE, MARTINSBURG, PARKVILLE, PAW PAW, PIKESVILLE, RANDALLSTOWN, SHEPHERDSTOWN, TOWSON, WESTMINSTER, WINCHESTER, AND WINCHESTER.
